game_description: Be a Baboon and run around with friends, do some parkour and, and also customize your Baboon.
review_1: I am Minani and I’m gonna become admin and dev for this game in a couple minutes B) I am great 3d modeler UPDATE: I’ve been a developer for like a month or two now and I am hella proud of my work:) I’ve made cosmetics, ideas and even help dash(owner) with problems that he had. I’m also helping dash make HUGE future update. I wont spoil or anything but all I’ll say is that the main idea/ frame of it is awesome Also the guy who gave 1 star is trash and doesn’t understand a good game
review_2: I love the game and the community is great
review_3: everyone is so nice there and i hope it will be like that forever
review_4: The game is really fun but there are a little bugs.
review_5: I think the owner worked very hard and I'm a co-owner so yeah 10/10
